item.title: Core Mechanics
item.description:
Core Mechanics: How Turn-Based Racing Works

A Different Kind of Racing Game

I know that turn-based racing might sound strange at first. But this game isn’t about speed or reflexes—instead, it’s about planning, precision, and strategy. Your ability to control acceleration and trajectory depends entirely on previous moves, requiring forward-thinking and adaptability.

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Why I’m Making a Turn-Based Racing Game

Who Am I?

I wouldn’t call myself a hardcore gamer, but I’ve enjoyed video games ever since I first laid hands on a Nintendo handheld back in the 80s. More than just entertainment, games have always fascinated me as interactive systems—complex, creative, and full of possibilities.
